title: Get an Outsunny Wooden Gardening Box for under £80!
content:
When it comes to maximising your growing potential, a wooden structure helps you to plant more without eating into your space. Just take this Outsunny Wooden Gardening Box from Aosom. With a shelf and a back net board, it provides the perfect place to cultivate all your favourite plants, vines, herbs and flowers. What’s more, once your display bursts into life, it will become a beautiful feature in your garden! Sound ideal? If you take advantage of this exclusive offer, you can get your display structure for just £79!

Claim your offer

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Aosom is an e-commerce retailer that sells a large range of homeware, garden, pet, office and car products from well-known brands such as Outsunny and Homcom.

With this exclusive deal, you can get an Outsunny Wooden Gardening Box for £79. The specifications are as follows:

  • Made from fir wood
  • Orange in colour
  • Rot-resistant
  • Simple assembly
  • Weight capacity: 25kg
  • Net weight: 6.1kg
  • 5 cm L x 31.5 cm W x 149.5 cm H

Claim your offer

Offer ends 13/09/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

You can find all our current shopping deals here. If you have any questions about the deal product or the related services, please contact the provider directly. author: Steve Newell
